chunk:
Beauty 360 All-In-One Micellar Cleansing Water (2020 formulation)

Brand: Beauty 360

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, HEXYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, DISODIUM COCOAMPHODIACETATE, DISODIUM EDTA, POLOXAMER 184, POLYAMINOPROPYL BIGUANIDE.

Directions: Shake well. Saturate a cotton pad. To Remove Eye Makeup: Hold pad over closed eyes for a few seconds, then gently wipe without harsh rubbing. To Cleanse skin & Remove Face Makeup: Gently wipe pad over skin until completely clean from makeup, dirt, and oil. Use daily, morning and night. No rinsing needed.

Warnings: For external use only. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with warm water. Keep out of reach of children

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
